creator: bjoern@comtec.e-technik.uni-kassel.de
ceki@apache.org
text:
Hello Bjoern,

This looks more like a deployment problem than a log4j bug per se. Do you have 
multiple versions of log4j in your classpath?

I am closing this report as INVALID. If you would like help resolving this 
problem, please contact the log4j-user mailing list.

See http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/docs/contactUs.html
